==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きん|ぞく|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きんぞく}} compound {{m|zh|金屬|tr=kim dzyowk|lit=metal + be attached to; category}}. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} reading ''kîm-su̍k''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|きんぞく|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きんぞく}}

# [[metal]]
#: {{ja-usex|鉄は有用な'''金属'''です。|^てつ は ゆうよう な '''きんぞく''' です。|Iron is a useful '''metal'''.}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|軽金属|けいきんぞく|gloss=light metals}}
* {{ja-r|重金属|じゅうきんぞく|gloss=heavy metals}}
* {{ja-r|非金属|ひきんぞく|gloss=a nonmetal}}
* {{ja-r|金属疲労|きんぞ くひろう|gloss=metal fatigue}}
